meanings.definition: Relating to the branch of genetics that studies the structure and function of cells, especially chromosomes.
meanings.sent1: The cytogenetic research focused on understanding how cells work at a deep level.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use cytogenetic techniques to examine the chromosomes in cells.
meanings.sent3: The cytogenetic scientist joked that chromosomes are like tiny puzzle pieces in the cell.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of cytogenetic principles was the key to unlocking the mysteries of cell structure.
meanings.sent5: The intricate world of cytogenetic analysis revealed the secrets hidden within cells.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the study of the genetic material of cells.
meanings.sent1: The cytogenetic study explored the DNA within the cell nucleus.
meanings.sent2: Researchers use cytogenetic methods to investigate genetic mutations in cells.
meanings.sent3: In the lab, the cytogenetic experiment unexpectedly led to a breakthrough in genetic research.
meanings.sent4: The importance of cytogenetic analysis cannot be overstated in understanding cell genetics.
meanings.sent5: The cytogenetic examination revealed the intricate genetic makeup of the cell.
